participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and hands-on, enjoys crafting and making things.
participant_1.background: Currently working at a gas station, has a passion for DIY projects.

content.text: I have a new hand-made table, I have done it with my hands!
I have got a work at the gas station. What is your job?
